nodes.text: Sevan Domna was a majordomo of Jabba Desilijic Tiure and the predecessor of Bib Fortuna. He was killed in an assassination attempt on Jabba sometime prior to the Invasion of Naboo. Jabba found Bib Fortuna serviceable, but not up to Domna's standards. Domma was considered his best majordomo that Jabba had.
